channel.title: Help me with newer items!
channel.description: help me with these newer items as i've been looking through lists i saw there's anger sword and crap like that whenever i put it in a shop command or do ::pickup it always freezes my account! It's happening with all the newer items. Atleast 7,000 and up like i tried the easter ring ohhh... freeze. so if anyone has a solution please please please post it![br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2007, 07:25:59 PM[/size][hr]oh and what do i need to do to put skill capes into the game?

item.title: Help me with newer items!
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

sorry this is it

		} 
		else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2)
			{
			try {
				int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
				int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
				if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
					addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
				} else {
					sendMessage("No such item.");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10");
			}[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2007, 08:13:19 PM[/size][hr]if you're thinking it freezes with all account no it's just for those newer items[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2007, 08:14:58 PM[/size][hr]with items* sorry put with all accounts

Read full topic
